VIVE Map Sign In Dashboard Profile Your are a contributor 76.000 checked visits checked visits Stop scanning explorer devices You can stop and start at any time Support Become a contributor Turn your device into a server and help us restore the country Share your COVID-19 status You can stop and start at any time Update your COVID-19 status I had COVID-19 diagnosed by a physician. Support Report any violation of privacy, so that the Vive team can make the necessary corrections. About how Vive works This app processes the visits of users in places, using COVID-19 status, social distance and other variables, calculates the the approximate statistical risk of contagion of the place in real time, without exposing the identity of the user. Start How this works Discover which places are safe and reduce the risk of spread the SARS-CoV-2 virus, by sharing your status anonymously. Letâ€™s restart our world working together!
